scenario_text.value:
Hey Minoru, what do you think about the
Kemonogami and human sacrifices?

Well that’s an awkward topic, isn’t it?
It’s the exact situation we’re all in...

Long story short, maybe all those
disappearing kids ended up in this world?
You mean like we did?

Yeah. They couldn’t find them anywhere, so it
sounds about right to me.
It’s possible...

Hmm... I cannot say anything for certain as
of yet, but the logic certainly lines up.
You think so? I don’t get it...

Then again, I might just be overthinking it.
We still might find a way back, after all.

(I wonder if they’re looking for us back in
our world?)

(...Actually, we’ve been so focused on this
world, we haven’t thought about ours.)

(A bunch of people might be looking for us,
with media coverage and everything...)

(I bet everyone’s losing it back home...
What’re Mom and Dad doing now, I wonder?)

(Then again, there might not be any panic at
all. That’d actually be scarier, I think.)
You know, Minoru...
(Back in our world, I wonder if...)
They’re going nuts?
They’re worried?
No one noticed?

Do you think they’re going nuts back there?
Like stories on the news or something?

You think? That’d be a hoot! I’m getting
chills just thinking about it!
Chills?

Yeah! If we’re on TV, that means we’re famous
on the small screen!

What is this “tee-vee” you speak of? Is this
screen such a marker of good fortune?

You bet it is! First you get the fame, then
you get the dames!
I can just see it now...
That’s all you can think about...

I know, I know, there’s no point in getting
excited about it in this world.
Do you think our parents are worried?

Hmm... Could be, now that you mention it.
...Yeah, could be.

What, cat got your tongue or something? It’s
like you thought no one would worry about us.

No, no, I think they are, just... Not all of
them are gonna worry the same, I’d say.

My mom’s kind of a workaholic, y’know? Maybe
she can’t fit worrying into her schedule.
And what about your dad?

They’re divorced, and he lives somewhere
else. Haven’t seen him in a while now.
Sorry, man...

Ahh it’s cool either way. It’s not like
I resent my mom or anything.
Naw, not a bit... I’d like to see her.
You think no one even noticed we’re gone?
Huh? Aw come on, there’s no way, man.

How can you tell? We don’t know a thing about
what’s going on over there.
Can’t help but imagine bad things, you know?
Takuma... Cheer up, would ya?

If we don’t know what’s going on, then let’s
figure things out as soon as we can.

We’ll get back to our world and see for
ourselves.
Minoru... Thanks, man, you’re right.
I hope we can go home soon...
Yeah. We’ll make it back for sure.
...Wait, what? Where’d my other sock go?
Man, I wanna go hooome...
